localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Brevy turns your website into a collaborative workspace, allowing anyone on your team to leave feedback or report issues directly inline. Connect your favorite tools like Slack and Jira to automatically create and assign work items without leaving the page.
blogPost.body: Brevy turns your website into a collaborative workspace, allowing anyone on your team to leave feedback or report issues directly inline. Connect your favorite tools like Slack and Jira to automatically create and assign work items without leaving the page.
blogPost.title: Brevy (beta) - Give feedback, Google-doc style, directly on your website
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Brevy将您的网站变成一个协作的工作空间，允许您团队中的任何人直接在线上留下反馈或报告问题。连接您最喜欢的工具，如Slack和Jira，无需离开页面就能自动创建和分配工作项目。
localize.tagline: 直接在您的网站上以Google-doc的方式提供反馈意见。

localize.description: Brevy將您的網站變成一個協作的工作空間，允許您團隊中的任何人直接在線上留下反饋或報告問題。連接您最喜歡的工具，如Slack和Jira，無需離開頁面就能自動創建和分配工作項目。
localize.tagline: 直接在您的網站上以Google-doc的方式提供反饋意見。

previous.excerpt: THINGS is a browser-based interactive 3D tool to generate custom device mockups. Our 3D devices can fit into your presentation, just upload your design, adjust settings and download your individual images directly in your Browser
previous.title: THINGS - Generate custom 3D device mockups in your browser

localize.description: THINGS是一个基于浏览器的交互式3D工具，用于生成自定义设备模型。我们的3D设备可以适合您的演示文稿，只需上传您的设计，调整设置，并直接在浏览器中下载您的个人图像。
localize.tagline: 在浏览器中生成自定义的3D设备模拟图。

localize.description: THINGS是一個基於瀏覽器的交互式3D工具，用於生成自定義設備模型。我們的3D設備可以適合您的演示文稿，只需上傳您的設計，調整設置，並直接在瀏覽器中下載您的個人圖像。
localize.tagline: 在瀏覽器中生成自定義的3D設備模擬圖。
